name: Rate-Limiting Nullifier: an effective spam protection solution for anonymous environments
description:
1. Problem of spam in anonymous environments (why it's hard to fight it) & abstract explanation how RLN solves it
2. RLN in-details (core concepts, etc.)
3. Use-cases of RLN
4. Infrastructure & announcement of production release; further research and improvements; call for contributions

speakers.name: Rasul Ibragimov
